attributes.action: To FORCE NISSAN TO BE ACCOUNTABLE FOR XTRAIL FAULTS that they have know exist since 2004 and NEVER CHANGED DESIGN OR DONE A RECALL
attributes.additional_details:
Nissan have known since 2004 that the XTRAIL have design faults which have them travelling in limp mode and unable to go over 3,000 revs.

Ultimately you go back to your car and it won't start,

This then can cost at least £2,000 upwards to get the car on the road again.

Nissan uk don't want to know and deny there is a problem when a quick search on the internet shows it's been a common fault for at least 10yrs with no recall or design adaptation

This is scandalous daylight robbery all over not only the uk but world wide scale by nissan, inc Australia, Tasmania and India etc

Something and someone has to stop us being ripped off and this daylight robbery!
